text_lang:
🤖 Initializing human communication mode...
🌍 Select language protocol
Tap the button below to synchronize with me! ⚙️🔗
welcome_chat: 🤖 Glad to see everyone in this %s chat!👋😃
welcome: I am your universal 🔩 bot assistant, ready to help you with anything you need. Just ask, and I’ll do my best! 🦾 📟 I recommend checking out the commands I can perform to get the most out of me.📚 ❯❯❯❯ /help ❮❮❮❮
welcome_back: 🤖 Nice to see you again, %s, how can I help you this time?😊 Check out the list of commands using the /help command 🤔.
welcome_person_options: 🤖 You don’t always need to use commands in a personal chat, but they can help make things clearer. You can simply send a video, a social media link, or a math equation, and I’ll do my best to assist you! 🎯
error_command: ⚠️ An error occurred while executing the command.
click_to_send: Click to send the result to the chat
wait_sec: Too fast! Wait a bit ⏳ ~%s sec
contacts: 📩 We’re open for ads, partnerships, and feedback — and yes, you can showcase your project right inside this bot! ✨ Whether you're launching a startup, boosting your Telegram bot, or sharing a cool tool — let’s grow together. 💌 Reach out anytime ai.poi.bot@gmail.com We usually reply fast — unless robots finally take over 🤖🔥 🚀 Let’s make something awesome!
